poem.title: for Chuck Peters
poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text: Wallace's guide on the Amazon Cooks a vial of tree-frog poison. - 'Want to put a drop in Darwin's gin? - Now that's such a vile idea! Wallace's guide on the Amazon Downs a butterfly with his blowpipe, Packs it away in the sample box, Sends it back to base. Wallace's guide on the Amazon Downs an elephant with his blowpipe. - But the Amazon doesn't have elephants! - Not no more.
